Hero.title: Smart Bill Management
Hero.subtitle: Simplified.
Hero.description: Upload your invoices and let AI organize them by date, total price, and more — secure and automatic.

HowItWorks.title: How Taxnify Works
HowItWorks.steps-upload-description: Simply drag and drop your invoice — secure, fast, and hassle-free.
HowItWorks.steps-analysis-description: Our smart AI extracts key information like amount, date, and vendor with precision.
HowItWorks.steps-organized-description: Invoices are instantly sorted and categorized — ready for viewing or export.

AIExplanation.ai-explanations-0-description: Allow multiple users across your company to securely upload and manage receipts in one centralized platform — always organized, always accessible.
AIExplanation.ai-explanations-1-description: Our AI smartly identifies which department, client, or project an expense belongs to — ideal for businesses with multiple cost centers or client accounts.
AIExplanation.ai-explanations-2-description: Stay on top of your company’s finances with dynamic reports, visual dashboards, and instant exports — perfect for managers and accountants alike.

Flexible.flexible-0-description: Whether you're a solo entrepreneur or a growing company, Taxnify adapts to your workflow. Upload invoices of any size — from large transactions to daily receipts — and let our AI handle the rest.
Flexible.flexible-1-description: Say goodbye to cluttered spreadsheets. Our platform automatically organizes documents, detects key financial data, and delivers clean reports you can rely on for planning and analysis.

features.title: Core Features That Empower Your Workflow
features.features-0-description: Detect and identify invoices with precision — even in large, cluttered document sets — using our next-gen AI engine.
features.features-1-description: Extract critical details like vendor, total amount, and due date automatically — saving time and reducing human error.
features.features-2-description: Your documents are encrypted end-to-end and stored securely. Taxnify is GDPR-compliant and designed to meet enterprise-level data protection standards.

footer.footer-description: Empowering your documents with smart AI automation. Simplify. Automate. Accelerate.
